price: Basi hawakuweza kusimama wala hawakuwa wenye kujitetea.
arabic: فَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ مِن قِيَامٖ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنتَصِرِينَ
footnotes: Basi hawakuweza kuinuka. Wala hawakuweza kujipigania kuijikinga na adhabu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: famā is'taṭāʿū min qiyāmin wamā kānū muntaṣirīna
